metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13871 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQLite 3.32.2 has a use-after-free in resetAccumulator in select.c because the parse tree rewrite for window functions is too late.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> probably introduced in 3.32.2, could not reproduce on focal

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
